summary: This document is a confirmation letter from Darren K. Indyke, legal counsel to NES, LLC, stating that Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of NES, LLC. It also confirms that Indyke is the sole member of New York Strategy Group, LLC. The communication emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the sole member of NES, LLC.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is the legal counsel to NES, LLC and confirms his own role as the sole member of New York Strategy Group, LLC.

connections.description: Darren K. Indyke serves as legal counsel to Jeffrey E. Epstein in his capacity as the sole member of NES, LLC.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of NES, LLC.
Darren K. Indyke is the legal counsel for NES, LLC.
Darren K. Indyke is the sole member of New York Strategy Group, LLC.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
